name: CarbonCreditRakebackFactory
description: A Carbon Credit Token Rakeback Factory.

eventDecorators.name: SwappedImplementationContract
eventDecorators.description: Emitted after the implementation contract has been swapped.

parameterDecorators.name: contractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - the address of the new implementation contract.

parameterDecorators.name: bundle_
parameterDecorators.description: - the bundle for this rakeback contract.

parameterDecorators.name: owner_
parameterDecorators.description: - the address to which ownership of the deployed contract will be transferred.

returnDecorators.description: the address of the newly created rakeback.

functionDecorators.name: deployedContractsCount
functionDecorators.description: The number of contracts deployed by this factory.

functionDecorators.name: implementationContract
functionDecorators.description: The implementation contract used to create new rakebacks.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: swapImplementationContract
functionDecorators.description: The owner is able to swap out the underlying implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: implementationContract_
parameterDecorators.description: - the contract to be used from now on.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
